People's Daily People's Daily full text RSS. Get more full text RSS: https://feedx.net http://www.people.com.cn/ 01版要闻 - 习近平同乌拉圭总统拉卡列会谈http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/23/nw.D110000renmrb_20231123_1-01.htm
;Thursday, November 23, 2023
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;November 22 On the afternoon of the same day, President Xi Jinping held talks at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing with President Lacalle of Uruguay, who was in China for a state visit. Before the talks, Xi Jinping held a welcome ceremony for Lacalle in the North Hall of the Great Hall of the People.
;Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Liu Bin

;
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;On the afternoon of November 22, President Xi Jinping held talks at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing with President Lacalle of Uruguay, who was in China for a state visit. Before the talks, Xi Jinping held a welcome ceremony for Lacalle in the North Hall of the Great Hall of the People.
;Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Li Xueren

;
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, November 22   (Reporter Yang Yijun) On the afternoon of November 22, President Xi Jinping held talks at the Great Hall of the People with President Lacalle of Uruguay, who was in China for a state visit. The two heads of state announced that they would upgrade China-Uzbekistan relations to a comprehensive strategic partnership.

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that 2023 marks the 35th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between China and Uruguay and the fifth anniversary of Uruguay joining the joint construction of the "Belt and Road" initiative. Since the establishment of diplomatic relations 35 years ago, the two countries have always adhered to mutual respect, equal treatment, and win-win cooperation, and exchanges and cooperation in various fields have flourished. Especially in the face of the COVID-19 epidemic, the two countries have helped each other and fought the epidemic together, and the China-Uzbekistan strategic partnership has been sublimated. China is willing to work with Uzbekistan to take the establishment of a comprehensive strategic partnership as a new starting point and new coordinate to enhance the level of bilateral relations, enrich the connotation of cooperation between the two countries, and build China-Uzbekistan relations into a country of unity and cooperation with different sizes, systems and cultures. model to better serve the development of their respective countries and enhance the well-being of the two peoples.

;

;Xi Jinping introduced the connotation and significance of Chinese-style modernization, saying that China is willing to strengthen exchanges with Uzbekistan on state governance, enhance political mutual trust, share development opportunities, and promote the modernization of their respective countries and the modernization of the world. The two sides should intensify friendly exchanges and cooperation between legislative bodies, political parties, and local governments, take the signing of the "Belt and Road" cooperation plan as an opportunity, strengthen the docking of development strategies, cultivate new momentum for cooperation in service trade, digital economy, clean energy and other fields, and promote the development of the China-Uzbekistan Communist Party. The construction of "One Belt and One Road" has entered a new stage of high-quality development. We welcome more Uruguayan high-quality agricultural and animal husbandry products and high value-added products to enter the Chinese market, encourage Chinese enterprises to invest and start business in Uruguay, and hope that Uruguay will continue to provide a good business environment for Chinese enterprises. The two sides should promote cultural, sports and other people-to-people exchanges and create more convenient conditions for personnel exchanges between the two countries. China is willing to provide more scholarships to Uzbekistan.

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that China and Ukraine have similar ideas on many international and regional issues, and have broad consensus and common interests. The two sides can further strengthen coordination and cooperation in multilateral mechanisms such as the United Nations and the World Trade Organization to transform the world. We must work together to achieve greater peace, prosperity and justice. China attaches great importance to the development of China-Latin America relations, appreciates that Uzbekistan has always actively participated in the overall cooperation between China and Latin America, supports the Southern Common Market and other regional organizations to close political dialogue and economic and trade cooperation with China, and hopes that Uzbekistan will continue to promote China-Latin America and China-South Africa cooperation.

;

;Lacalle said that he was pleased to lead an important cabinet and economic and trade delegation to visit China on the occasion of the 35th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between Ukraine and China. Since the establishment of diplomatic relations between Uruguay and China 35 years ago, the development of relations between the two countries has always adhered to the principles of equality, respect, mutual benefit and win-win. Political mutual trust between the two parties is solid. It is a strong consensus of all walks of life and the entire people of Uruguay to continuously deepen Uruguay-China relations. The Uruguayan government recognizes that there is only one China in the world and that peaceful reunification is China's internal affairs and must be decided by the Chinese people themselves. Both Ukraine and China firmly defend multilateralism, safeguard free trade, and are committed to promoting world peace and stability. Uzbekistan-China relations have gone beyond the economic and trade field and have shown a good trend of multi-dimensional and high-level development. Uruguay actively supports the joint construction of the "Belt and Road", agrees with the global development initiative, global security initiative, and global civilization initiative proposed by President Xi Jinping. It hopes to strengthen cooperation in the fields of economy and trade, science and technology, sports, tourism, and welcomes more Chinese companies to invest in Uruguay. Support the establishment of more Confucius Institutes in Ukraine to promote personnel exchanges and cultural exchanges between the two countries. Uzbekistan looks forward to accelerating free trade cooperation with China and at the same time pushing the Southern Common Market towards this goal. Uzbekistan is willing to play an active role in promoting the development of Latin America-China relations and the construction of the Latin America-China Forum.

;

;After the talks, the two heads of state jointly witnessed the signing of the cooperation plan for the joint construction of the "Belt and Road", including trade and investment, digital economy, green development, agriculture, health, education, culture, technological innovation and customs inspection and quarantine. A number of bilateral cooperation documents.

;

;Before the talks, Xi Jinping held a welcoming ceremony for Lacalle in the North Hall of the Great Hall of the People.

;

;A 21-gun salute was fired in Tiananmen Square, and soldiers lined up to pay tribute. The two heads of state ascended the reviewing stand, and the military band played the national anthems of China and Ukraine. Accompanied by Xi Jinping, Lacalle inspected the honor guard of the Chinese People's Liberation Army and watched the procession.

;

;That night, Xi Jinping held a welcome banquet for Lacalle in the Golden Hall of the Great Hall of the People.

;

;Wang Yi participated in the above activities.

;

;During Lacalle's visit to China, the two sides issued the "Joint Statement between the People's Republic of China and the Eastern Republic of Uruguay on the Establishment of a Comprehensive Strategic Partnership."

;; Thu, 23 Nov 2023 05:56:05 +0800 01版要闻 - 习近平会见俄罗斯国家杜马主席沃洛金http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/23/nw.D110000renmrb_20231123_2-01.htm
;Thursday, November 23, 2023
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;On the afternoon of November 22, President Xi Jinping met with Russian State Duma Chairman Volodin at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing.
;Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Liu Weibing

;
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, November 22  ; (Reporter Yang Yijun) On the afternoon of November 22, President Xi Jinping met with Chairman of the Russian State Duma Volodin at the Great Hall of the People.

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that China and Russia are each other's largest neighbors, both are permanent members of the United Nations Security Council, and share extensive common interests. This year, President Putin and I had two face-to-face in-depth exchanges and reached many new consensuses on deepening China-Russia comprehensive strategic coordination and practical cooperation in various fields. Next year marks the 75th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between China and Russia. China is willing to work with Russia to continuously deepen bilateral relations featuring permanent good-neighborly friendship, comprehensive strategic coordination, and mutually beneficial cooperation, so as to inject new impetus into the development and revitalization of the two countries and provide more stability for world prosperity and stability. sex.

;

;Xi Jinping emphasized that strengthening cooperation between legislative bodies plays an important role in ensuring the stability and long-term development of China-Russia relations. It is hoped that the Russian State Duma and the National People's Congress of China will strengthen the exchange of legislative experience, give full play to the role of the special committees and parliamentary friendship groups of the two countries' legislative bodies, provide more complete legal support for bilateral cooperation, and ensure the joint construction of the "Belt and Road" initiative and the European Union Connect with the Asian Economic Alliance and deepen communication and collaboration on multilateral platforms such as the Shanghai Cooperation Organization, BRICS, and the G20.

;

;Volodin said that under the strategic guidance of President Xi Jinping and President Putin, Russia-China relations have reached the best level in history. All parties in the Russian State Duma have a high degree of consensus in supporting the development of friendly relations with China. Russia firmly adheres to the one-China policy and firmly supports China in safeguarding national sovereignty and territorial integrity. Russia is willing to work with China to strengthen exchanges and cooperation between the legislative bodies and parties of the two countries, actively implement the important consensus reached by the two heads of state, deepen the friendship and mutual trust between the peoples, and provide strong legal guarantee for the sustainable development of Russia-China comprehensive strategic partnership of coordination in the new era, and provide a strong legal guarantee for the two countries. Contribute to relationship development.

;

;Wang Yi and Peng Qinghua attended the meeting.

;; Thu, 23 Nov 2023 05:56:05 +0800 01版要闻 - 我国5G基站总数达321.5万个（新数据 新看点）http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/23/nw.D110000renmrb_20231123_3-01.htm
;Thursday, November 23, 2023
; ;

;Our newspaper, Beijing, November 22nd (Reporter Wang Zheng) A reporter from the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology on the 22nd It was learned that my country’s 5G network construction continues to accelerate, the depth of integrated applications continues to expand, and innovation capabilities continue to improve. As of the end of October, the total number of 5G base stations reached 3.215 million, accounting for 28.1% of the total mobile base stations.

;

;From existence to excellence, the foundation for the development of the digital economy has been continuously consolidated. my country has built the world's largest and most technologically advanced 5G network. 5G base stations have covered all prefecture-level cities and counties. There are 22.78 5G base stations per 10,000 people, and more than 90% of 5G base stations are co-constructed and shared; 5G mobile The number of telephone users reached 754 million, a net increase of 193.6 million from the end of the previous year.

;

;From weak to strong, industrial technology strength continues to increase. In recent years, my country has made overall breakthroughs in key 5G technologies, and has built a relatively complete 5G industrial chain covering systems, chips, terminals, instruments and other links, and the basic strength of the industry continues to increase. my country’s 5G standard essential patent declarations account for 42% of the world’s total.

;

;From point to surface, application empowerment is more evident. There are more than 8,000 "5G + Industrial Internet" projects, more than 1,800 5G factory projects, 5G industry applications have been integrated into 67 major categories of the national economy, and the number of application cases exceeds 94,000. 5G has been widely used in vertical industries such as industry, mining, power, and ports, helping companies improve quality, reduce costs, and increase efficiency.

;

;In addition, from January to October, my country's communications industry continued to perform well. Telecom business revenue totaled 1,416.8 billion yuan, a year-on-year increase of 6.9%. The cumulative traffic of mobile Internet reached 245.6 billion GB, a year-on-year increase of 14.8%.

;; Thu, 23 Nov 2023 05:56:05 +0800 01版要闻 - 李强出席二十国集团领导人视频峰会并发表讲话http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/23/nw.D110000renmrb_20231123_4-01.htm
;Thursday, November 23, 2023
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;On the evening of November 22, Premier Li Qiang of the State Council Beijing attended the G20 Leaders' Video Summit and delivered a speech.
;Photographed by Xinhua News Agency reporter Zhai Jianlan

;
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, November 22nd   Premier Li Qiang of the State Council attended the G20 Leaders’ Video Summit in Beijing on the evening of November 22 and delivered a speech.

;

;Li Qiang said that the Declaration of the New Delhi Summit of the G20 Leaders issued the voice of the times to adhere to unity and cooperation and jointly respond to global crises. The current road to world economic recovery is still difficult. As President Xi Jinping pointed out, the members of the G20 are all world and regional powers and should reflect the responsibilities of major powers and play an exemplary role. China is willing to work with all parties to uphold the original intention of cooperation, respond to the call of the times, and work together to create a better future for mankind.

;

;Li Qiang pointed out that we must continue to adhere to the priority of development, put development cooperation in a prominent position, accelerate the realization of strong, sustainable, balanced and inclusive growth of the world economy, and oppose the politicization of development issues and the pan-security change. It is necessary to take more pragmatic measures, adhere to goal orientation and problem orientation, implement the consensus reached at the New Delhi Summit, and continue to achieve practical results. We need to coordinate more closely, revitalize multilateralism, continue to strengthen macro-policy cooperation, and take more care of the concerns of developing countries in the reforms of the World Trade Organization, the International Monetary Fund and other institutions.

;

;Li Qiang emphasized that history has repeatedly proved that the world economy will prosper if it is open, and will decline if it is closed. Recently, China has successfully hosted the 3rd Belt and Road International Cooperation Summit Forum and the 6th China International Import Expo, achieving fruitful cooperation results and demonstrating with practical actions its firm determination to promote high-level opening up and share development opportunities with the world. China is willing to continue to work together with all parties in an open and inclusive manner to make greater contributions to world economic recovery and global development and prosperity.

;

;Leaders of G20 members, leaders of guest countries and heads of relevant international organizations attended the meeting. Prime Minister Narendra Modi of India, which holds the chairmanship of the G20 this year, presided over the meeting.

;

;The leaders attending the meeting said that today’s world is facing multiple challenges, and members of the G20 should show the spirit of unity and cooperation, adhere to the action orientation, practice multilateralism, and deepen the response to climate change, digital economy, green development, Cooperate in artificial intelligence and other fields, promote the reform of the global economic governance system, strengthen support and assistance to developing countries, and achieve more robust, inclusive and sustainable development.

;

;Wu Zhenglong attended the meeting.

;; Thu, 23 Nov 2023 05:56:05 +0800 01版要闻 - 赵乐际会见萨摩亚议会议长帕帕利http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/23/nw.D110000renmrb_20231123_5-01.htm
;Thursday, November 23, 2023
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, November 22nd Zhao Leji, Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress, met with Satsuma Satsuma in Beijing on the 22nd Speaker of the Asian Parliament Papali.

;

;Zhao Leji said that Samoa is one of the first Pacific island countries to establish diplomatic relations with New China. Since the establishment of diplomatic relations between the two countries 48 years ago, bilateral relations have made great progress and have effectively enhanced the well-being of the two peoples. China is willing to further strengthen political mutual trust and mutual support with El Salvador, expand mutually beneficial cooperation in various fields, and enhance mutual understanding and mutual understanding between the people. Mr. Speaker is welcome to come to China to participate in the seminar for members of parliament from Pacific Island countries. The National People's Congress of China is willing to work with the Parliament of El Salvador to give full play to the functions of the legislative body, carry out experience exchanges in areas such as legislation and supervision, and contribute to promoting the joint construction of the "Belt and Road" and expanding cooperation in various fields. China is willing to continue to strengthen cooperation with Pacific island countries to achieve common development.

;

;Papali said that Samoa firmly adheres to the one-China principle. Samoa has benefited a lot from the joint construction of the “Belt and Road”. The Parliament of El Salvador is willing to strengthen exchanges with the National People's Congress of China and make unremitting efforts to promote cooperation between the two countries.

;; Thu, 23 Nov 2023 05:56:05 +0800 01版要闻 - 蔡奇分别会见蒙古人民党代表团、日本公明党代表团http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/23/nw.D110000renmrb_20231123_6-01.htm
;Thursday, November 23, 2023
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, November 22  On November 22, Member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Secretary of the CPC Central Committee Secretary Cai Qi met with a delegation led by General Secretary of the Mongolian People's Party Amarbaysgaren and a delegation led by Japan's Komeito leader Natsuo Yamaguchi in Beijing.

;

;When meeting with the Mongolian People's Party delegation, Cai Qi said that General Secretary Xi Jinping has met with Mongolian leaders many times in recent years to draw up a blueprint for relations between the two countries. The Communist Party of China is willing to work with the Mongolian People's Party to promote the implementation of the important consensus reached by the leaders of the two parties and the two countries, and take the 75th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between China and Mongolia next year and the 30th anniversary of the signing of the Treaty of Friendly Cooperation between China and Mongolia as an opportunity to consolidate political mutual trust and promote pragmatism Cooperate, expand people-to-people and cultural exchanges, promote Asian values, deepen exchanges and mutual learning of governance experience, create a model of shared destiny, win-win cooperation, people-to-people connectivity, and unity, and promote China-Mongolia comprehensive strategic partnership to a higher level.

;

;Amarba Yisgeleng said that there have been frequent high-level exchanges between Mongolia and China recently and strong cooperation in various fields. The Mongolian People’s Party supports the comprehensive integration of Mongolia’s development strategy with the “Belt and Road” initiative and strengthens the governance of the two parties. Political exchanges and mutual learning.

;

;When meeting with the Japanese Komeito delegation, Cai Qi said that this year marks the 45th anniversary of the signing of the Treaty of Peace and Friendship between China and Japan. General Secretary Xi Jinping recently met with Prime Minister Fumio Kishida to reaffirm the comprehensive promotion of strategic and mutually beneficial relations between the two countries. Positioning has pointed out the direction of efforts for both China and Japan. The ruling parties of the two countries should implement the important consensus reached by the leaders of the two countries, accurately grasp each other's development and strategic intentions, promote a positive and friendly mutual understanding, and work together to build Sino-Japanese relations that meet the requirements of the new era. Cai Qi also clarified China's position on issues such as history, Taiwan, and the discharge of Fukushima nuclear contaminated water into the sea.

;

;Natsuo Yamaguchi said that the Komeito Party is willing to uphold the Komeito founder Daisaku Ikeda’s firm belief in Japan-China friendship, actively promote exchanges and cooperation between the two countries in various fields, give full play to the role of the ruling party’s exchange mechanism, properly handle differences, and resolve difficulties and promote the improvement and development of Japan-China relations.

;; Thu, 23 Nov 2023 05:56:05 +0800 01版要闻 - 丁薛祥会见“港澳青年看祖国”各界港澳青年代表交流团http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/23/nw.D110000renmrb_20231123_7-01.htm
;Thursday, November 23, 2023
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, November 22 On the afternoon of the same day, I met with the "Hong Kong and Macao Youth See the Motherland" exchange group of Hong Kong and Macao youth representatives from all walks of life at the Great Hall of the People, took photos with them and held discussions.

;

;Ding Xuexiang said that General Secretary Xi Jinping has deep affection and high hopes for the youth of Hong Kong and Macao. He hopes that the majority of young people from Hong Kong and Macao will cultivate their feelings for their family and country, hone their skills, and grow into pillars of talent who can take on important responsibilities as soon as possible. If the youth of Hong Kong and Macao develop well, Hong Kong and Macao will develop well, and the country will develop well. We must have a deep understanding of the general development trend of the country and the world, effectively enhance national pride and sense of ownership, and show new responsibilities, new actions, and new atmosphere in the new era. Strengthen the study of national and national history, use practical actions to interpret the feelings of home and country, and make patriotism become a common practice among the youth of Hong Kong and Macao. We must always stand firm in the face of major issues of right and wrong, safeguard national sovereignty, security, and development interests, and be a new force in promoting the stability and long-term development of "one country, two systems." Actively integrate into the overall development of the country, cherish the good years, chase dreams, work hard, sing the song of youth and write a wonderful life on the new journey of building a strong country and national rejuvenation.

;

;Young representatives from Hong Kong and Macao spoke enthusiastically, sharing their experiences of visiting and exchanges in the mainland of the motherland. They unanimously expressed the need to inherit the fine traditions of patriotism, Hong Kong and Macao, strengthen their mission, actively participate in national construction, and tell the story of contemporary China. Tell the stories of Hong Kong and Macao about the successful implementation of "one country, two systems" and contribute youthful energy to the realization of the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation.

;

;Since the beginning of this year, the theme exchange activity "Hong Kong and Macao Youth See the Motherland" has promoted 165,000 Hong Kong and Macao youths to exchange in the mainland. The "Hong Kong and Macao Youth See the Motherland" exchange group of Hong Kong and Macao youth representatives from all walks of life consists of 150 representatives who have participated in the theme exchange activities.

;

;Xia Baolong attended the meeting.

;; Thu, 23 Nov 2023 05:56:05 +0800 02版要闻 - 推动巴勒斯坦问题早日得到全面、公正、持久解决http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/23/nw.D110000renmrb_20231123_1-02.htm
;Thursday, November 23, 2023
; ;

;On the evening of November 21, President Xi Jinping attended the BRICS Leaders’ Special Video Summit on the Palestinian-Israeli Issue and delivered a speech titled The important speech "Promoting Ceasefire and War Ending to Achieve Lasting Peace and Security" focused on the development and prominent issues of the Palestinian-Israeli situation and in-depth explanation of China's position and propositions. International people interviewed by our reporter spoke highly of the positive and constructive role China has played since the outbreak of the current round of Palestinian-Israeli conflict. They believed that President Xi Jinping’s important speech was conducive to building international consensus on peace promotion, promoting the realization of ceasefire and war, and protecting civilians. , provide important assistance to alleviate the humanitarian situation and restore the peace process, demonstrating China's responsibility as a responsible major country in safeguarding international fairness and justice.

;

;;“Contributing BRICS strength to resolving the cycle of Palestinian-Israeli conflicts”;

;

;The BRICS cooperation mechanism is a platform for emerging market countries and developing countries to strengthen solidarity and cooperation, An important platform for safeguarding common interests. This summit is the first leaders’ meeting after the BRICS expansion. President Xi Jinping emphasized that under the current circumstances, it is very timely and necessary for the BRICS countries to speak out for justice and peace on the Palestinian-Israeli issue.

;

;Andrei Vinogradov, chief researcher at the Institute of China and Modern Asia at the Russian Academy of Sciences, said that the historic expansion of BRICS this year fully demonstrates the growing international influence of BRICS. . The convening of the BRICS leaders’ special video summit on the Palestinian-Israeli issue shows that the BRICS countries are actively expanding political and security cooperation, safeguarding peace and tranquility, practicing true multilateralism, and are committed to finding a comprehensive, just and lasting solution to the Palestinian-Israeli issue. .

;

;Hussein Ismail, a researcher at the Political Academy of the Egyptian General Information Administration, said that this summit demonstrated the constructive and responsible role of BRICS countries in international affairs and showed that BRICS countries are maintaining International fairness and justice are increasingly playing an important role. The BRICS countries actively mediate in the Palestinian-Israeli conflict, advocate dialogue and negotiation, and build international consensus. These efforts have been supported and recognized by Arab and Islamic countries. "There are no winners in wars, and only peace is in the interest of everyone." Ismail said, "BRICS leaders emphasize resolving disputes through dialogue and support all efforts that are conducive to peaceful resolution of crises. BRICS countries have strengthened cooperation with all parties. coordination and contribute BRICS strength to the cycle of resolving the Palestinian-Israeli conflict.”

;

;Abdel Aziz Shabani, a researcher at the Center for Political and Strategic Studies in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, said that the conflict in Gaza has caused a large number of civilian casualties and humanitarian disasters, and that all parties urgently need to take practical actions to promote a ceasefire. Stop the war. This summit is the first leaders’ meeting after the expansion of the BRICS. The BRICS countries coordinate their positions and take actions on the Palestinian-Israeli issue, highlighting the efforts made by the BRICS countries to promote conflict de-escalation and restore peace, and its significance to international security, peace and stability. Significance.

;

;Tan Zheli, a South African expert on China issues, said that this summit demonstrates the important role of BRICS countries in international affairs. "Only when the international community works together can we find a way out for the Palestinian-Israeli conflict." Tan Zheli said that the international community should work with the BRICS countries to hold high the banner of multilateralism, unite and cooperate, and work together to provide support for the implementation of the "two-state solution." Solid foundation.

;

;;"China stands on the side of peace and justice on the Palestinian-Israeli issue";

;

;The conflict in Gaza has lasted for more than a month, causing a large number of China is deeply concerned about civilian casualties and humanitarian disasters, and the trend of expanding spillover. In response to the current situation, President Xi Jinping pointed out that the top priorities are: first, all parties to the conflict must immediately cease fire and fighting, stop all violence and attacks against civilians, release detained civilians, and avoid more serious loss of life. The second is to ensure the safe and smooth flow of humanitarian relief channels, provide more humanitarian assistance to the Gaza people, and stop forced relocation, water, electricity and oil cuts and other collective punishments against the Gaza people. Third, the international community must take practical measures to prevent the conflict from expanding and affecting the stability of the entire Middle East region. All parties should implement the requirements of relevant resolutions of the United Nations General Assembly and Security Council. China's series of propositions have been widely appreciated by international people.

;

;Ahmed Ibrahim, a Saudi expert on international issues, said: “President Xi Jinping’s speech once again shows that China stands on the side of peace and justice on the Palestinian-Israeli issue, and always insists on promoting peace. talks and calls on all parties to cease fire and end the war as soon as possible."

;

;"The proposals put forward by President Xi Jinping provide ideas for resolving the cycle of Palestinian-Israeli conflicts." Historian, University of Buenos Aires, Argentina Nestor Restivo, editor-in-chief of "Contemporary" magazine, said that under the guidance of the concept of building a community with a shared future for mankind, China has always advocated the peaceful settlement of international disputes and advocated dialogue and cooperation. China and other BRICS countries have made unremitting efforts to restore the peace process. The Palestinian-Israeli issue must be resolved jointly by the international community.

;

;President Xi Jinping emphasized that the fundamental reason why the situation between Palestine and Israel has developed to this day is that the Palestinian people's rights to statehood, survival, and return have been ignored for a long time. The fundamental way out to resolve the recurring conflict between Palestine and Israel is to implement the "two-state solution", restore the legitimate rights of the Palestinian nation, and establish an independent Palestinian state.

;

;Homat, director of the Asian Studies Center of the University of Tehran, Iran, said that President Xi Jinping profoundly pointed out the fundamental reasons why the situation between Palestine and Israel has developed to this day, "demonstrating China's position and efforts to safeguard international fairness and justice, and helps promote The Palestinian issue will be resolved comprehensively, justly and lastingly at an early date."

;

;Shabani highly agreed with the important propositions put forward by President Xi Jinping and believed that China has always firmly supported the just cause of the Palestinian people to restore their legitimate national rights and has always stood with the Palestinian people. The international community should uphold an objective and fair stance, adhere to the fundamental direction of the "two-state solution", and push the Middle East peace process back on track on the basis of relevant United Nations resolutions and the principle of "land for peace".

;

;Najira Azharuni, a senior researcher at the UAE Trend Research and Consulting Center, said that the BRICS countries are an important positive, stable and constructive force in international affairs. China calls for the implementation of the "two-state solution", the restoration of the legitimate rights of the Palestinian nation, and the establishment of an independent Palestinian state. This is the fundamental way to resolve the Palestinian issue.

;

; ;“Committed to promoting peace, security, and stability in the region”;

;

;President Xi Jinping pointed out that since the outbreak of the current round of Palestinian-Israeli conflict, China has actively promoted peace and stability. negotiate, promote a ceasefire and an end to the war, provide emergency humanitarian assistance to the Gaza Strip, and will continue to provide material assistance based on the needs of the Gaza people. As the rotating president of the United Nations Security Council this month, China has pushed the Security Council to pass relevant resolutions, requiring the extension of the humanitarian moratorium and humanitarian corridors, the protection of civilians, and the provision of humanitarian assistance.

;

;Al-Jabala, a member of the Egyptian Foreign Affairs Committee and a columnist for Al-Ahram newspaper, said that China has always called for a ceasefire and war, the protection of civilians, and the opening of humanitarian corridors to avoid greater humanitarian disasters. In particular, China, as the rotating president of the United Nations Security Council, presided over the adoption of Security Council Resolution 2712. Jabala said that China's position on the Palestinian-Israeli issue is highly recognized by the majority of Arab countries. A joint delegation of foreign ministers from Arab and Islamic countries recently visited China. They expressed their gratitude to China for its leadership in promoting the adoption of important resolutions by the United Nations General Assembly and the Security Council, and hoped to work with China to promote an immediate ceasefire, increase humanitarian assistance, and effectively implement the "two-state solution." .

;

;Tan Zheli said that China plays an active role in promoting peace talks and promoting the resolution of international and regional hot issues. China has proposed a global security initiative, promoted the resumption of diplomatic relations between Saudi Arabia and Iran, worked hard to maintain peace and stability in the Middle East, and made important contributions to stabilizing the international security situation.

;

;Haomaite said that as a responsible major country, China has made active efforts to promote peace and talks on the Palestinian-Israeli issue. "China's position on the Palestinian issue is consistent and clear, and it is committed to promoting peace, security, and stability in the region and creating good conditions for regional cooperation and development."

;

;China calls for a more comprehensive meeting as soon as possible. The authoritative International Peace Conference builds international peace-promoting consensus and promotes an early comprehensive, just and lasting solution to the Palestinian issue. Shabani said: "This call conforms to the international trend and reflects the universal voice of all walks of life in the Arab world."

;

;French international issues expert Jean Pegure said that China has promoted the restoration of diplomatic relations between Saudi Arabia and Iran and has successfully contributed to peace in the Middle East. Bring hope. The Palestine-Israel issue is complex and difficult to resolve. We hope that China’s call for “a more authoritative international peace conference to be convened as soon as possible” can be realized at an early date. Dialogue is the only way to solve problems, and we look forward to the resumption of the Middle East peace process as soon as possible.

;

;Anna Garcia, director of the BRICS Policy Research Center in Brazil, said that the international community, especially the Arab countries, speaks highly of China's just stance on the Palestinian issue and its role as a responsible major country. Since the outbreak of the current round of Palestinian-Israeli conflict, the Chinese government has been actively committed to promoting peace talks and provided much-needed humanitarian assistance to the people of Gaza, demonstrating China's responsibility as a major country. "I believe that in the future, China will continue to play an important role in promoting the implementation of Security Council Resolution 2712 and promoting the 'two-state solution.'" Garcia said.

;

;Vinogradov said that a joint delegation of foreign ministers from Arab and Islamic countries recently visited China and highly praised China for adhering to principles and upholding justice, which demonstrated China's influence on regional issues. Vinogradov said: "China has always actively promoted BRICS cooperation, united developing countries, and jointly safeguarded the interests of all countries. We look forward to China playing a greater role in promoting ceasefires and wars, and achieving lasting peace and security."

;

;(This newspaper’s Beijing, Moscow, Cairo, Dubai, Johannesburg, Buenos Aires, Islamabad, Paris, and Rio de Janeiro November 22 reports  Reporters Gong Ming, Sui Xin, Shen Xiaoxiao, Huang Peizhao, Guan Kejiang, Ren Haoyu, Yan Yunming, Xu Fang, Cheng Shijie, Shang Kaiyuan, Song Yiran)

;; Thu, 23 Nov 2023 05:56:05 +0800 02版要闻 - 对话合作是两国唯一正确选择（钟声）http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/23/nw.D110000renmrb_20231123_2-02.htm
;Thursday, November 23, 2023
; ;

;With a view to better coping with common challenges and enhancing the interests of the two peoples, China and the United States should make the list of cooperation longer , make the cake of cooperation even bigger, and make Sino-US cooperation a "must-have option" more deeply rooted in the hearts of the people. In-depth dialogue will make it difficult to achieve long-term progress. This must become an indispensable part of the entire process." The San Francisco meeting between the heads of state of China and the United States achieved many results, including the establishment of an intergovernmental dialogue on artificial intelligence, which encouraged the international science and technology community as soon as it was announced. . This shows that the two heads of state agree to promote and strengthen dialogue and cooperation between China and the United States in various fields, which is in line with the common expectations of the two peoples and the international community, helps to establish a stronger bond of interests for Sino-US relations, and increases the international community’s support for the stability of Sino-US relations. The confidence to come down and get better.

;

;President Xi Jinping pointed out at the meeting in San Francisco that China and the United States have broad common interests in many fields, including traditional fields such as economy, trade, and agriculture, as well as emerging fields such as climate change and artificial intelligence. Under the current situation, the common interests between the two countries have not decreased, but have increased. This sets the tone for China and the United States to jointly promote mutually beneficial cooperation. The important consensus and results achieved at the meeting once again prove that mutual benefit and win-win are the essential characteristics of Sino-US relations, and dialogue and cooperation are the only correct choice for the two countries.

;

;The Sino-US relationship is the most important bilateral relationship in the world, and it is also a very complex bilateral relationship. To accurately grasp the relationship between these two major countries, we must not only see the phenomena and details, but also grasp the essence and overall situation, and avoid generalizing and neglecting the fundamentals. In recent years, some people in the United States have fallen into misunderstandings on how to define Sino-US relations. They always mention competition, as if competition has become the biggest theme or even the entire issue in Sino-US relations. This view not only deviates from the basic reality of Sino-US relations, but also risks pushing both sides into conflict and confrontation. It is normal for China and the United States to compete in some areas, but from an overall and overall perspective, it is not difficult to see that competition is only a tributary, and common interests are the mainstream. No conflict, no confrontation, and peaceful coexistence between China and the United States are the most basic common interests of the two countries. The economies of China and the United States are deeply integrated and face new development tasks. They need to benefit from each other's development, which is also a common interest. Post-epidemic recovery of the global economy, response to climate change, and resolution of regional hotspot issues are also inseparable from coordination and cooperation between China and the United States, which are of common interest.

;

;Promoting mutually beneficial cooperation requires necessary conditions and atmosphere. Cooperation should be a two-way street and cannot and should not be a one-way street. Both sides should respect each other, be reciprocal and benefit each other, focus on the overall situation, and provide a good atmosphere for bilateral cooperation. Some people in the United States want to demand unconditional cooperation from China in areas where China is in need, while continuing to contain and suppress China, undermining China's legitimate rights and interests. This logic cannot be established and cannot be accepted by China. China advocates win-win cooperation between China and the United States, but China has interests that must be safeguarded, principles that must be defended, and bottom lines that must be adhered to. Only by adhering to mutual respect, equality and mutual benefit can dialogue and cooperation be stable and long-term and truly benefit the two peoples.

;

;Promoting mutually beneficial cooperation is inseparable from necessary channels and mechanisms. President Xi Jinping pointed out that the two sides should make full use of the mechanisms restored or established in the fields of diplomacy, economy, finance, commerce, agriculture and other fields to carry out cooperation in areas such as drug control, judicial law enforcement, artificial intelligence, science and technology. This fully demonstrates China's sincere desire and responsible stance to promote mutually beneficial cooperation between China and the United States and promote the improvement of Sino-US relations. In recent years, due to well-known reasons, China-US relations have encountered serious difficulties, and some dialogue and cooperation channels established by the two sides over decades have been interrupted. This is not in the fundamental interests of the two countries and is not in line with the true wishes of the two peoples. The San Francisco meeting between the heads of state of China and the United States reached important consensus on promoting dialogue and cooperation. The two sides decided to strengthen high-level exchanges and promote institutional consultations in various fields such as commerce, economy, finance, export control, Asia-Pacific affairs, maritime, arms control and non-proliferation, foreign policy planning, joint working groups, and persons with disabilities. The two sides agreed to initiate negotiations on renewing the China-US Science and Technology Cooperation Agreement and restart the China-US Joint Committee on Agriculture. Both sides should make good use of these channels and mechanisms to enable them to effectively play their role in promoting mutually beneficial cooperation.

;

;History and reality have repeatedly shown that as long as China and the United States promote mutually beneficial cooperation, they will be able to create opportunities for both sides to better cope with their respective challenges and achieve development. China and the United States have developed bilateral trade of US$760 billion and accumulated two-way investment of more than US$260 billion, which has brought growth momentum and people's livelihood and welfare to both sides. American companies have the largest exhibition area at the CIIE for six consecutive years. This year, more than 200 American companies participated in the exhibition. This fully shows that the American business community sees opportunities in China and hopes to continue mutually beneficial cooperation with China. China is committed to high-quality development, and the United States is also working to revitalize the economy. There is unlimited space for cooperation between the two sides, and they can achieve mutual success and win-win results. With a view to better coping with common challenges and promoting the interests of the two peoples, China and the United States should extend the list of cooperation and make the cake of cooperation bigger, so that Sino-US cooperation is a "must-have" more deeply rooted in the hearts of the people.

;

;Win-win cooperation is the trend of the times and the foundation of China-US relations. China and the United States should seize the opportunity, meet each other halfway, jointly promote mutually beneficial cooperation, and jointly consolidate the positive momentum of bilateral relations.

;;
;

;;https:// feedx.best;

; Thu, 23 Nov 2023 05:56:05 +0800 02版要闻 - 王毅同新加坡外长维文通电话http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/23/nw.D110000renmrb_20231123_3-02.htm
;Thursday, November 23, 2023
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, November 22  On November 22, Member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Minister of Foreign Affairs Wang Yi had a phone call with Singaporean Foreign Minister Vivian Balakrishnan as requested.

;

;Victoria Vivian said that New Zealand and China have close relations and in-depth cooperation. New Zealand is willing to take new measures to facilitate personnel exchanges between the two countries and further increase flight exchanges between the two countries. New Zealand is willing to work with China to give full play to the role of bilateral cooperation mechanism meetings and further deepen bilateral cooperation.

;

;Wang Yi said that under the strategic guidance of the leaders of the two countries, China-New Zealand relations have been upgraded to a comprehensive and high-quality forward-looking partnership, and cooperation in various fields has maintained a strong momentum. China is willing to work with New Zealand to provide more convenient conditions for the further resumption of personnel exchanges between the two sides, make up for the losses suffered by the epidemic in the past three years as soon as possible, and push the cooperation between the two countries to a higher level. Both sides should make good use of China-Singapore bilateral cooperation mechanisms to promote cooperation between the two countries to achieve more results.

;

;Weiwen expressed congratulations on the success of the San Francisco meeting between the heads of state of China and the United States. Singapore and ASEAN countries welcome this, and ASEAN issued a statement specifically on this. Sino-US relations are of vital importance to the world, and decoupling between China and the United States will have a serious negative impact on the world.

;

;The two sides also exchanged views on international and regional issues of common concern.

;; Thu, 23 Nov 2023 05:56:05 +0800 02版要闻 - 第十批在韩中国人民志愿军烈士遗骸装殓仪式在韩国仁川举行http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/23/nw.D110000renmrb_20231123_4-02.htm
;Thursday, November 23, 2023
; ;

;Incheon, South Korea, November 22 (Reporter Zhang Yue) According to the consensus reached by China and South Korea , this year the two sides will continue to hold handover activities for the remains of volunteer army martyrs in South Korea. From November 20 to 23, 2023, the Ministry of Veterans Affairs, the Propaganda Department of the Central Committee, the International Department of the Central Committee, the Central Cyberspace Administration, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the Ministry of Finance, the Political Work Department of the Central Military Commission and other departments formed a Chinese handover delegation to South Korea. Jointly organized and implemented the handover of the remains of the tenth batch of volunteer martyrs in South Korea.

;

;On the morning of November 22, China and South Korea jointly held an enshrinement ceremony for the remains of the tenth batch of volunteer martyrs at the "Temporary Remains of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army Martyrs" in Incheon, South Korea. Chang Zhengguo, Vice Minister of the Ministry of Veterans Affairs of China, led all members of the Chinese handover delegation, relevant personnel of the Chinese Embassy in South Korea, as well as Chinese students in South Korea and representatives of Chinese-funded enterprises to attend the ceremony. The South Korean Ministry of National Defense and its affiliated remains excavation and inspection Relevant personnel of the delegation were present.

;

;The ceremony was solemn and solemn. The Chinese handover delegation and representatives of the Chinese Embassy in South Korea presented flower baskets to the martyrs of the Volunteer Army; the head of the Chinese handover delegation stepped forward to arrange the flower basket ribbons; subsequently, all Chinese personnel participating in the event Bow three times to the martyrs of the volunteer army and present flowers to the martyrs of the volunteer army. After the Chinese memorial ceremony, South Korean staff decorated the remains of the volunteer martyrs.

;

;Since 2014, China and South Korea have followed humanitarian principles, conducted candid, friendly and pragmatic cooperation, and have successfully handed over the remains of 913 Chinese People’s Volunteer Army martyrs in South Korea for nine consecutive years. This year is the tenth handover implemented in accordance with the consensus between China and South Korea. South Korea will return the remains of 25 martyrs and related relics to China. On November 23, China and South Korea will jointly hold a handover ceremony for the remains of the tenth batch of volunteer martyrs in South Korea at Incheon International Airport in South Korea.
